'''''Bloomsbury Auctions: Modern First Editions, English & Continental Literature & History, Emblem Books, Economics & Law 13 March 2008''''' is an auction catalogue from Bloomsbury Auctions (London). The description for Lot 156 includes quotes from a letter from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to Ingrid Pridgeon (cf. "[[Letter to Ingrid Pridgeon]]"). The second page of the letter is reproduced in a photograph.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Christina Scull]], [[Wayne G. Hammond]]|articleurl=http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/chronology.html|articlename=Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology|dated=|website=HS|accessed=8 June 2012}}</ref>
